1.0.name: wordpress/radio-amber-alerts-ticker
1.0.description: This widget adds a Radio Amber Alert Ticker with a photo of the abducted child in your wordpress sidebar. The photo links to the actual Radio Amber Alert page on RadioAmber.net with all the abduction information + photos + recorded mp3 alert. It additionally links to the widget/ticker download page for others to get any of the available tickers. Pages open in a new window, user remains on your site.
